about.description:
Django-environ allows you to utilize 12factor inspired environment variables to configure your Django application.
This module is a merge of:
  -envparse
  -honcho
  -dj-database-url
  -dj-search-url
  -dj-config-url
  -django-cache-url

and inspired by:
  -12factor
  -12factor-django
  -Two Scoops of Django
about.summary: Django-environ allows you to utilize 12factor inspired environment variables to configure your Django application.

about.description:
Django-environ allows you to utilize 12factor inspired environment variables to configure your Django application.
This module is a merge of:
  -envparse
  -honcho
  -dj-database-url

about.summary: Django-environ allows you to utilize 12factor inspired environment variables to configure your Django application.

name: django-environ
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "django-environ" %}
{% set version = "0.11.2" %}
{% set sha256 = "f32a87aa0899894c27d4e1776fa6b477e8164ed7f6b3e410a62a6d72caaf64be" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python >3.7
    - pip
  run:
    - python >3.7
    - django >=1.8

test:
  imports:
    - environ
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/joke2k/django-environ
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: Django-environ allows you to utilize 12factor inspired environment variables to configure your Django application.
  description: |
    Django-environ allows you to utilize 12factor inspired environment variables to configure your Django application.
    This module is a merge of:
      -envparse
      -honcho
      -dj-database-url
      -dj-search-url
      -dj-config-url
      -django-cache-url

    and inspired by:
      -12factor
      -12factor-django
      -Two Scoops of Django

  doc_url: https://django-environ.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/joke2k/django-environ

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - rxm7706
    - cshaley
    - rxm7706
    - millsks
    - elanqo
    - zaigner
